messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On November 5, DET. D. E. Robinson was alerted about a potential smuggling ring operating out of the city's port. Key informants were Mr. Lopez, a dock worker, and Ms. Bennett, customs officer. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. F. G. Stevens - OPERATIONS Det. Robinson, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective H. I. Jones and Detective J. K. Lambert collaborated with port authority officials. SMITH 16:10 Smuggling Mr. Lopez described suspicious cargo movements, while Ms. Bennett highlighted irregular shipping manifests. Documentation. Technician Veronica cross-referenced the provided manifests with official records. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Robinson Sr, Det. Jones, Det. Lambert OPERATIONS Lt. Stevens INFORMANT Bennett, Alice 185 Maple Drive, Harbor Town, Delaware 228-1555. 94995. SMITH 16:10 Smuggling By 5:30 PM, Detectives Robinson, Jones, and Lambert, under Lieutenant Stevens' supervision, identified three containers of interest. Captain L. M. Newton authorized a covert inspection. Sergeant N. O. Palmer and Sergeant P. Q. Ross coordinated with port security. By 7:45 PM, illegal contraband was discovered in two of the three containers. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Robinson Sr, Det. Jones, Det. Lambert OPERATIONS Lt. Stevens AFFIDAVIT - Smuggling Report 1) Shipping Manifests 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Container Photos 5) Port Security Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE R. Simmons H.T.P.D. 40.170 P90 4275 Lopez, MIGUEL NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 230-4575 DETECTIVE: D. ROBINSON ITEM: 90-5950- 117 CRIME: 16:10 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 85660 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 5/04/25 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. D. E. Robinson  Officer Context: On November 5, DET. D. E. Robinson was alerted about a potential smuggling ring operating out of the city's port. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. F. G. Stevens  Officer Context: Lt. F. G. Stevens - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective H. I. Jones  Officer Context: Detective H. I. Jones and Detective J. K. Lambert collaborated with port authority officials. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective J. K. Lambert  Officer Context: Detective H. I. Jones and Detective J. K. Lambert collaborated with port authority officials. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Veronica  Officer Context: Documentation. Technician Veronica cross-referenced the provided manifests with official records. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Robinson  Officer Context: By 5:30 PM, Detectives Robinson, Jones, and Lambert, under Lieutenant Stevens' supervision, identified three containers of interest. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Jones  Officer Context: By 5:30 PM, Detectives Robinson, Jones, and Lambert, under Lieutenant Stevens' supervision, identified three containers of interest. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Lambert  Officer Context: By 5:30 PM, Detectives Robinson, Jones, and Lambert, under Lieutenant Stevens' supervision, identified three containers of interest. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain L. M. Newton  Officer Context: Captain L. M. Newton authorized a covert inspection. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant N. O. Palmer  Officer Context: Sergeant N. O. Palmer and Sergeant P. Q. Ross coordinated with port security. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant P. Q. Ross Officer Context: Sergeant N. O. Palmer and Sergeant P. Q. Ross coordinated with port security. Officer Role: Sergeant
